sentences.en: A preliminary groundwork must be laid this year.
Be sure to cover all the necessary groundwork before signing binding contracts.
sentences.cn: 天秤座:在签署合约前确保做好一切基础工作.

sentences.en: But a preliminary groundwork must be laid this year.
sentences.cn: 但是今年要打好初步基础.

sentences.en: By hearty co - operation, the USSR could hasten victory and help lay the groundwork for postwar co - operation.
sentences.cn: 如果俄国衷心合作, 那它是加速取胜,并协同奠立战后合作基础的.

sentences.en: Go ahead and lay the groundwork for your next great achievement.
sentences.cn: 要始终向前,并为下一次的成功铺就平坦之路.

sentences.en: Groundwork is organized into holds, strangulations and joint locks.
sentences.cn: 寝技包括固技 、 绞技和关节技.

sentences.en: His speech laid the groundwork for independence.
sentences.cn: 他的演说为独立打下了基础。

sentences.en: Much of the groundwork has already been done .
sentences.cn: 准备工作已经完成了很多。

sentences.en: Officials are laying the groundwork for a summit conference of world leaders.
sentences.cn: 官员们正在为世界首脑峰会做准备工作。

sentences.en: That movement laid sufficient groundwork for the Party's Seventh National Congress.
sentences.cn: 那次整风为七大作了充分的准备.

sentences.en: These courses provide the groundwork of statistical theory.
sentences.cn: 这些课程介绍的是统计学理论的基础。

sentences.en: This was the groundwork of his oration.
sentences.cn: 这些就是他那番话的基调.

sentences.en: This, they feel, may lay the groundwork for financial independence and secession.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得, 如此可以打下财政独立与成功的基础.

sentences.en: Unit testing is well as the groundwork of software testing.
sentences.cn: 作为测试中的基础测试,单元测试有着不可忽略的作用.

sentences.en: We laid the groundwork today for long - term prosperity, as well.
sentences.cn: 我们今天也为 长期 的繁荣奠定了基础.

sentences.en: With those figures, you'll be laying groundwork for going into the 35 th Amendment.
sentences.cn: 您引用了这些数字, 再把话题引向第三十五号修正案就有良好的基础了.

sentences.en: Yesterday's meeting was to lay the groundwork for the task ahead.
sentences.cn: 昨天的会议是为以后的工作做准备。

words.tran_cn: [电] 接地；基础；搁浅；（染色的）底色

trans.tran_en: something that has to happen before an activity or plan can be successful
